field.name: summary
field.value: factory facility doesn't get to launch until all component dependencies are resolved

field.name: description
field.value:
if X component has dependency on Y in constructor, kernel throws unresolved dependency exception when I try to request the component. I have component created with a factory and Y dependency is resolved at run-time.
the only way around this right now is to move depedency to a property, which is not always possible.
if this is a limitation of castle architecture (all dependency get resolved for a component before facility gets a chance to work with it) then it needs to be documented
